Voluntold.today

Who will be voluntold.today?

Peace-of-mind for blameless teams

Volunteer

In a team context volunteering is an altruistic activity where an individual, the volunteer, provides services for no financial or social gain to benefit the team.

The thing is...volunteers are not always easy to find! Ask for a volunteer and half your team will suddenly feel the urge to tie their shoelaces, check that report they hadn't look at for the whole morning, use the toilet or just stare at you with that "not me, please..." look you know so well.

That's where the voluntold shines!

Voluntold

A voluntold provides services for no financial or social gain to benefit the team, just like the volunteer. Except they don't get a chance to look other way.

The team chooses a volunteer, a random hero to save the day. Voluntols are designated by the team. Voluntolds are chosen without a chance to reject their mission. They take a bullet for the common good. They are team heroes.

Choosing a voluntold is not a task that comes without regrets. Nobody likes to point fingers. If there only was a way to randomly chose a voluntold for today's retro facilitation... some name raffle to randomly designate a team member to prepare that deck for the client presentation today...

Welcome to voluntold.today! Input your team member names in the form and... let the voluntold games begin, and may the odds be ever in your favor!
